body_html: Code is currently failing due to divide by 0 in sample_gamma, we might need argcheck here. Gamma concentration parameter should be positive, but it's possible that it can be fed 0 here.
body_text: Code is currently failing due to divide by 0 in sample_gamma, we might need argcheck here. Gamma concentration parameter should be positive, but it's possible that it can be fed 0 here.
body: Code is currently failing due to divide by 0 in `sample_gamma`, we might need argcheck [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/224975142274fd8d3a8dee5feb7a08f034408cae/aten/src/ATen/native/Distributions.h#L60). `Gamma` concentration parameter should be positive, but it's possible that it can be fed 0 here.
